title: enda vidamAghilum nanda mukundanai
sahitya:
enda vidamAghilum nanda mukundanai nI inda vazhi varum vaghai pAraDi


anupallavi

  gandham kamazh kuzhali rAdhE rAdhE enru kaniya manamurugi punainduraittadu kaLLattanamenru meLLa nI sholli


caraNam    sheidadellAm vanjamallavO peNNE cintittup-pArAi idaiyE ennE ennE kai viLangum kuzhalai nI kavarndODi vA munnE kai kaTTi ODi varuvAraDi pinnE
